parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

datasetStructure: One record per product accountability finding per subject

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.STUDYID

datasetVariables.description: Unique identifier for a study within the submission.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.
datasetVariables.label: Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DASEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a domain. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: DASEQ

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DAGRPID

datasetVariables.description: Used to tie together a block of related records in a single domain for a subject.
datasetVariables.label: Group ID
datasetVariables.name: DAGRPID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DAREFID

datasetVariables.description: Optional internal or external identifier such as a code from the product packaging (e.g., bottle label, package label, kit label).
datasetVariables.label: Reference ID
datasetVariables.name: DAREFID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DASPID

datasetVariables.description: Sponsor-defined reference number. May be preprinted on the CRF as an explicit line identifier or defined in the sponsor's operational database. Examples: Line number on the Product Accountability CRF page, a code from the product packaging (e.g., bottle label, package label, kit label).
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor-Defined Identifier
datasetVariables.name: DASPID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DALNKID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to link related records across domains. This may be a one-to-one or a one-to-many relationship.
datasetVariables.label: Link ID
datasetVariables.name: DALNKID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DALNKGRP

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to link related records across domains. This will usually be a many-to-one relationship.
datasetVariables.label: Link Group ID
datasetVariables.name: DALNKGRP

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C78732

modelClassVariable.title: Short Name of Measurement, Test, or Exam

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DATESTCD

datasetVariables.description: Short character value for DATEST used as a column name when converting a dataset from a vertical format to a horizontal format. The short value can be up to 8 characters and cannot begin with a number or contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores. Examples: "DISPAMT", "RETAMT".
datasetVariables.label: Short Name of Accountability Assessment
datasetVariables.name: DATESTCD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C78731

modelClassVariable.title: Name of Measurement, Test, or Exam

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DATEST

datasetVariables.description: Verbatim name corresponding to the topic variable of the test or examination used to obtain the product accountability assessment. The value in DATEST cannot be longer than 40 characters. Examples: "Dispensed Amount", "Returned Amount".
datasetVariables.label: Name of Accountability Assessment
datasetVariables.name: DATEST

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DACAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to define a category of topic-variable values. Examples: "STUDY MEDICATION", "RESCUE MEDICATION".
datasetVariables.label: Category
datasetVariables.name: DACAT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DASCAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to define a further categorization level for a group of related records.
datasetVariables.label: Subcategory
datasetVariables.name: DASCAT

priorVersion.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DASTRESC

self.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

datasetVariables.description: Contains the result value for all product accountability assessments copied or derived from DAORRES, in a standard format or in standard units. DASTRESC should store all results or findings in character format; if results are numeric, they should also be stored in numeric format in DASTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Result or Finding in Standard Format
datasetVariables.name: DASTRESC

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DASTRESN

datasetVariables.description: Used for continuous or numeric results or findings in standard format; copied in numeric format from DASTRESC. DASTRESN should store all numeric test results or findings.
datasetVariables.label: Numeric Result/Finding in Standard Units
datasetVariables.name: DASTRESN

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DASTRESU

datasetVariables.description: Standardized units used for DASTRESC and DASTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Standard Units
datasetVariables.name: DASTRESU

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DASTAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to indicate that a product accountability assessment was not done. Should be null or have a value of "NOT DONE".
datasetVariables.label: Completion Status
datasetVariables.name: DASTAT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DAREASND

datasetVariables.description: Reason not done. Used in conjunction with DASTAT when value is "NOT DONE".
datasetVariables.label: Reason Not Done
datasetVariables.name: DAREASND

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.VISITNUM

datasetVariables.description: Clinical encounter number. Numeric version of VISIT, used for sorting.
datasetVariables.label: Visit Number
datasetVariables.name: VISITNUM

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.VISIT

datasetVariables.description: Protocol-defined description of a clinical encounter. May be used in addition to VISITNUM and/or VISITDY.
datasetVariables.label: Visit Name
datasetVariables.name: VISIT

datasetVariables.description: Date and time of the product accountability assessment represented in ISO 8601 character format.

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DA.DADY

datasetVariables.description: Study day of product accountability assessment, measured in integer days. Algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC in Demographics.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of Visit/Collection/Exam
datasetVariables.name: DADY

description: A findings domain that contains the accountability of study products, such as information on the receipt, dispensing, return, and packaging.
label: Product Accountability
name: DA
